Judul: REFORMASI SEKTOR KEAMANAN TERHADAP PERUSAHAAN KEAMANAN SWASTA PT. NAWAKARA PERKASA NUSANTARA
Abstrak:
Reformasi Sektor Keamanan pada aktor-aktor negara sedang dilakukan pada TNI dan Polri. Namun pada lembaga BIN, Bakorkamla dan Satpol PP belum dilakukan. RSK pada TNI dan Polri masih dilakukan pada aspek sistem manajerial (Managerial System), seperti penataan kelembagaan, keorganisasian, wewenang dan fungsi dan hal-hal teknis operasional seperti pengawasan dan akutabilitas. Namun RSK tersebut belum mampu mengubah secara signifikan ke arah nilai-nilai keamanan publik (Values System), seperti penghormatan hak asasi manusia, rule of law dan orientasi pelayanan keamanan publik. Kesadaran dan nilai-nilai aktor keamanan negara masih berorientasi represif, diskriminatif dan belum berpihak pada publik.                     
 
 
 
 
 

Begitu juga dengan Reformasi Sektor Keamanan terhadap perusahaan keamanan swasta. RSK yang terjadi baru pada aspek (managerial system), yaitu reformasi struktur dan fungsi, akuntablitas dan transparansi, profesionalisme dan hal-hal teknis operasional lainnya seperti kurikulum, pelatihan, dan standarisasi. RSK pada aspek manajerial inipun belumlah optimal dan masih banyak kendala-kendala.                     
 
 
 
 
 

Sementara RSK pada aspek sistem nilai-nilai (values system) belum mengalami perubahan signifikan. PT. Nawakara Perkasa Nusantara masih mengadopsi nilai-nilai lama seperti berorientasi private oriented, mengutamakan profit, lebih berpihak pada klien (Ã‚Â“membela yang bayarÃ‚Â”). Keamanan yang disediakan dan dikelola oleh PT. Nawakara Perkasa Nusantara dianggap sebagai barang privat (rivalry dan excludable) dimana hanya bisa diakses, diperoleh dan digunakan oleh kliennya saja, sementara masyarakat (publik) tidak bisa mengakses dan menggunakan jasa layanan keamanan yang disediakannya. Dengan demikian hubungan RSK dengan PT. Nawakara Perkasa Nusantara masih pada aspek manajerial (managerial system), belum pada sistem nilai (values system)

Kata Kunci: Security Sector Reform on the stateÃ‚Â’s security institutions such as TNI and Polri is on going process. But, the reformation on BIN, Bakorkamla and Satpol PP is not conducted yet. Security Sector Reform on TNI and Polri has been done on managerial level, likes institution, organization, autorities and functions arrangement and other operational elements such as oversight and accountability. But the Security Sector Reform programme has not been able to transform the old security values into public security values significantly, such as respect of human rights, rule of law, and public security orientation. The conscienness and values of stateÃ‚Â’s security actors are still based on repressive, discrimination and not in favour of public service orientation.  The same Security Sector Reform process is also happening on the private security company. Security Sector Reform programme has been conducting on the managerial level, such as reformation on structure and function, accountability and transparancy, professionalism, and other technical components likes curriculum, training, and standarization. Security Sector Reform on the managerial system is not optimum and there are still many barries and problems.  Meanwhile the Security Sector Reform on the values system level is not change significantly yet. PT. Nawakara Perkasa Nusantara, as the object (case study) on this research is still adopting old values, such as private oriented service, profit oriented, and stand up for its own clients or in other words to defend who pay them. Security goods that provided and managed by PT. Nawakara Perkasa Nusantara is perceived as a private goods (rivalry and excludabel) which can be accessed, achieved and used by its clients only, but on the other hand, people (public) cannot acessed and used the security service that provided by this company. Indeed, the relationship between security sector reform and PT. Nawakara Perkasa Nusantara is still on managerial system level, not reach the transformation of values system yet.
